name: Brainesia Scroll Effect
author: brainesia

sections.description:
Brainesia Scroll Effect will make animation on your content when visitors scroll the website page.
You will see the Brainesia Scroll Effect icon in your editor. Just click the icon and you will see the box to choose an effect. Recently we provide 3 animation: fade in up, fade in left, rotate in left. We will put some new animation later.

Credits:
* Viewportchecker : http://dirkgroenen.github.io/jQuery-viewport-checker/
* animate.css : http://daneden.github.io/animate.css/
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire brainesia-scroll-effect folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the entire brainesia-scroll-effect folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
